backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing component purposes, data structures, and styling configurations for the Spyderstild gaming peripherals website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining design tokens for backgrounds, borders, accents, and component styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application into a root div and references the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles the application layout with Header, HomePage main content, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with brand information, category navigation links with smooth scrolling, social media icons, copyright notice, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with Spyderstild logo, responsive desktop/mobile navigation menus for product categories (mice, keyboards, monitors, PC builds), and smooth scroll functionality.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section featuring background image, animated gradient title, tagline, CTA button with smooth scroll to products, and decorative geometric elements.
frontend/src/components/HomePage.tsx: Main page component that renders the hero section followed by four product category sections (mice, keyboards, monitors, PC builds) with their respective data and accent colors.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Reusable product card component with hover effects, customizable neon borders in four colors, conditional background images for Hacking PC and Gaming PC, and spec list display.
frontend/src/components/ProductCategoryS: React component that renders a product category section with a title, description, banner image, and grid of product cards, supporting customizable neon accent colors (green, cyan, orange, red).
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines Product interface and exports arrays of product data for mice (6 products), keyboards (3 products), monitors (3 products), and PC builds with detailed specifications for each item.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an actor instance for backend communication, supporting both authenticated (with Internet Identity) and anonymous modes, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for React Query hooks to interact with the backend; currently no backend functionality is implemented for this static showcase site.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind imports, custom CSS variables for dark theme colors (including neon accent colors), custom scrollbar styling, and geometric clip-path utilities for the futuristic design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme (neon accents, dark theme), zero border radius for sharp geometric design, custom font families (Orbitron, Rajdhani, Inter), and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the gaming PC website (www.spyderstild.shop) with architectural notes, existing features including product sections for peripherals and PC builds, and development history.
